extendedInfo.description: Ever needed a quick tip on Battlefield 3? Some information on a weapon? Then Battlefield 3 Pocket Guide is for you! With plenty of information about all the weapons, vehicles, attachments, etc... Complete with all stats about weapons, attachments, vehicles and even equipment. Also with the new level tracker you can find out exactly what you unlock at each level. The stats are very detailed including maximum and minimum damage, range, rate of fire, bullet velocity, etc... The app is always updated and contains all of the DLC packs so far. Including Back to Karkand, Close Quarters, Armored Kill, Aftermath and End Game. Coming Soon: Maps, specializations, classesAll of the guns:Assault Rifles- AEK-971- AK-74M- AN-94- AS VAL- F2000- G3- KH2002- M16A3- M416- Famas- L85A2Carbines- A-91- AKS-74u- G36C- M4A1- SCAR H- SG553- G53Machine Guns- M27 IAR- M240B- M249- M60E4- PKP Pecheneg- RPK-74M- Type 88 LMGPistols- .44 Magnum- 93R- G17C- G18- M9- MP412 REX- MP443Shotguns- 870MCS- DAO-12- M1014- SAIGA-12K- USAS-12Personal Defense Weapons- MP7- P90- PP-2000- PDW-R- UMP-45- PP-19- XBOWSniper Rifles- M39 EMR- M40A5- M82A3- M98B- MK11 MOD 0- SKS- SVD- SV98

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: Awsome job on the app. I use it pretty much every day. I took a star away cause all the guns arent on it like the m60 machine gun.
reviews.author: Kacy Boyd

reviews.title: Best guide ever!
reviews.comment: Its awesome! That\'s all I have to say
reviews.author: Ben Wright

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Easy to find the info you\'re looking for and just great!!!
reviews.author: Luis Peralta

reviews.title: Good stats
reviews.comment: Very good app to learn more about the game and weapons. Goes in detail about everything. I would recommend it if you love bf3. Great thing to have
reviews.author: Jack Brown

reviews.title: Good resourse but not perfect
reviews.comment: This pocket book definately helped me and it has some pretty nice stats to compare which weapons is better than another. And it also definately has some good pointers on guns as well as good info. However i find myself 5 out of 5 considering some of the stats are wrong. For example, the M27 IAR reloads at 1.9 seconds with a bullet in the chamber, not 2.9 but other than minor faults like those if a good guide. Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: Erik Torreblanca

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its a great guide.
